page.title: 16The Weather
page.content:
The climate produces quite a lot of rain - usually in the form of fairly light showers - with some large-scale storms drifting in from the sea.
There is often a steady wind, made worse by the very flat land and the relatively few large trees or other windbreaks.
The latest types of tractor, in use by the local farms, have enclosed cabs with heaters, and also headlights at both ends, so that field work cam go on in most weathers and even into the night if necessary.
During dry sunny weather, there tends to be a lot of dust in the air... it is to be hoped that erosion does not spoil the rich soil.
